headline: Ralph Lauren (RL) Ascends While Market Falls: Some Facts to Note
summary: The latest trading day saw Ralph Lauren (RL) settling at $289.49, representing a +1.13% change from its previous close.

headline: Retail sector playbook: Best & worst stock picks
summary: BMO Capital Markets managing director Simeon Siegel joins Market Domination with Josh Lipton to discuss the newest retail sales data and what it means about the state of the consumer. Watch the video above to hear Siegel's top stock pick in the retail sector and the stock he's bearish on. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Ralph Lauren’s Quarterly Earnings Preview: What You Need to Know
summary: Ralph Lauren is gearing up to unveil its first-quarter results next month, and analysts are forecasting a double-digit surge in earnings, fueled by the brand’s continued global momentum and elevated consumer demand.
